metadata.title: USN-5576-1 -- Twisted vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Twisted incorrectly parsed some types of HTTP requests in its web server implementation. In certain proxy or multi-server configurations, a remote attacker could craft malicious HTTP requests in order to obtain sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5576-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  twisted-doc - 22.1.0-2ubuntu2.3 python3-twisted - 22.1.0-2ubuntu2.3 No subscription required
